title: Verify inline policy with dlp profile having file profile and rule classification with file upload matching both label and dlp rule
custom_steps:
Create a dlp profile with the following:
  File Profiles
    Matches
    akjha-1-mip
  Rule | Classification
    DLP Rule = Bank-CC or Name-Addr-CC-EXP or Name-CC-EXP or Name-Credit Card (CC)
Configure a policy for box: upload, dlp-profile configured above, action: block
Send traffic hitting this policy - file having both the lable and CC info.
custom_expected:
File upload should hit the policy
Verify dlp related info in skopeit event
Verify file lable related info in skopeIT 
very incidents from skopeit page
